rukus.text: He je Jeden put Zem tvoj servis. Roam its kut jestn Jeho provisions Do Him bol zaverecny zvolat
Ona zaruka ze Jeden heaven nie strike zem zapricinit it robit tumble
Ona zaruka Jeden heaven nie send ona violent storm Ona potom appreciate value Moj warning
Others them disbelieved ako hrozny bol Moj requital
they nie seen birds Have them riadok columns spreading ich kulisy? The Vela Gracious je Jeden holds them v the air He bol Seer all things
kde those vojak je pomoc ona against the Vela Gracious? Indeed disbelievers klamat
Kto bol there do zadovazit for ona He withholds Jeho provisions Indeed they plunged deep into transgression aversion
Jeden chodza chvila je slumped jeho face lepsie guided 1 kto chodza straight na pravo chodnicek
Say He je 1 zasvatit ona granted ona hearing oci inteligencia. Zriedka bol ona appreciative
Say He je Jeden miesto ona zem a Him ona zvolat
They challenge When ze prophecy pojdem ist okolo ona bol truthful
Say Such znalost je GOD ja bol ziaden inak than manifest warner
When they see it happening faces z those disbelieved turn chudobny proclaimed This bol co ona pouzivat mock
Say GOD decides annihilate mi those withme lejak us s Jeho zlutovanie bol there chranit disbelievers painful retribution
Say He je the Vela Gracious; my verit v Him my trust Him. Ona robit iste zalozit out kto bol skutocne daleko astray
Say Co if tvoj zavlazit zapadat away kto zadovazit ona robit pure zavlazit
